actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution designating rooms in the Capitol as the "Harry Flood Byrd Room".

summary.text: Designates the rooms located in the United States Capitol numbered S-113, S-114 as the "Harry Flood Byrd Room", in honor of the great U.S. Senator (1933-1965) from Virginia. Directs the Committee on Rules and Administration to place an appropriate marker or inscription at a suitable location or locations to commemorate and designate such rooms as provided herein.

titles.title: A resolution designating rooms in the Capitol as the "Harry Flood Byrd Room".
